eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Arizona; at 04:09 PM ON DEC 17, 2025 Effective until 12:09 AM DEC 18, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Peoria Police Department is looking for 73 year old Charles Monson last seen in Cave Creek driving a 2024, blue Mazda 3 Hatchback with Arizona License Plate CWX7244. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
